ðŸ“– Summary: Runtipi is a personal homeserver orchestrator designed for easy management and running of multiple services on a single server. It leverages Docker and provides a web interface to simplify service management, eliminating the need for manual configuration and networking complexities. It aims to be a user-friendly solution for self-hosting applications.
